description: This table stores patient infection information received from external sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INFECTION_REFERENCE_ID
columns.description: The unique reference identifier associated with the infection.

columns.name: INFECTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the infection.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INFECTION_RECEIVED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The HL7 Act status received for the infection.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Normal


Aborted


Active


Cancelled


Completed


Held


New


Suspended


Nullified


Obsolete

columns.name: INFECTION_END_DATE
columns.description: The date the infection was marked resolved.

columns.name: INFECTION_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the DXR record that owns the instance of this infection.

columns.name: INFECTION_LAST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last time the infection has been updated.

columns.name: INFECTION_HIST_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the infection is currently active or historical.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current


Historical


Inactive


Discontinued


Deleted

columns.name: INFECTION_LAST_INDICATED_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the most recent date on which the infection was indicated.
